channel.title: CVE Feed for POSIMYTH -- The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for POSIMYTH -- The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite

item.title: CVE-2024-35709|2024-08-02T03:14:53.990Z -- posimyth -- the%20plus%20addons%20for%20elementor%20page%20builder%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POSIMYTH The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite: from n/a through 5.5.4.
